data.title: PC Video Games | 83
data.meta_description: Page 83. video games for PC sorted by popularity among gamers. PC (Personal computer) - one of the most popular home platforms and the only one which doesn’t offer playing video games as its main purpose.
data.text:
Terrorist Takedown 3

Action 04 May 2010

Terrorist Takedown 3 is the third installment of a series of action games by the Polish CITY Interactive studio. The player takes on the role of a member of an anti-terrorist unit, which is sent to Somalia in order to rebound a ship kidnapped off the coast there. There are a number of dangerous missions that require the use of various military vehicles and equipment.

Falcon 4.0

Simulation 11 December 1998

Advanced simulator of the famous American fighter F-16, thanks to which you will be able to carry out a number of unforgettable combat missions.

Need for Speed III: Hot Pursuit

Racing 10 October 1998

The third installment in the bestselling racing game series created by EA. The game allows us to drive the fastest cars in the world. This time it contains eight brand new racing tracks and eleven licensed vehicles among which one can find cars such as Aston Martin DB7, Ferrari 550 Maranello, and Lamborghini Diablo SV. The included editor lets us create hundreds of individual vehicles as well. The biggest novelty in Need for Speed III: Hot Pursuit is the option to play on both sides of the law.

If My Heart Had Wings

Adventure 25 May 2012

If My Heart Had Wings is a visual novel adventure for PCs. The game tells the story of a school club whose members are trying to build a glider. The fun comes down to following the plot and making choices at key moments with far-reaching consequences.

Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom

RPG 23 March 2018

Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom is the next installment in the jRPG series developed by Level 5. Young king Evan Pettiwhisker Tildrum is the game's protagonist. After our hero was banished from his own kingdom, a fellow named Roland decides to help him get his throne back. Things got much more complicated when the city of Ding Dong Dell was faced with the danger that threatens the entire world. Our heroes have no other choice than to face it.

Sonic Mania

Arcade 29 August 2017

A 3D platformer that came out as a reboot of one of the most popular adventure game series, featuring the titular Sonic the Hedgehog. This production was created by a SEGA’s subsidiary, Sonic Team, employing people who helped create the series and its most important iterations.

Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition

Action 13 May 2014

Self-contained extension for Dynasty Warriors 8. Produced by Omega Force studio, the addition introduces two new heroes, changes in Commander Mode, as well as a system of online rankings. Apart from novelties, the production also has the whole content of the basic version of the game.

My Child Lebensborn

Adventure 01 June 2021

An unusual production, in which we play as a babysitter of an adopted child. My Child Lebensborn takes place in the 20th century, in Norway of the 50’s, with the kid we take care of being the titular Lebensborn – a kid which was born as part of a special program to increase a number of Aryans in the world. This lead to it being ridiculed by others due to having a German father.

Empires of the Undergrowth

Strategy 07 June 2024

Developed by Slug Disco Studios, the game is an unusual real-time strategy, which places the player in control of an anthill. The experience is accompanied by a commentary resembling narration in a documentary film. This element of the game teaches the player a lot of interesting facts concerning the functioning of an anthill.

Youtubers Life

Simulation 02 February 2017

A simulation game developed by Spanish studio U-Play online, in which the player can assume the role of an internet vlogger who, while being famous, recalls his first steps in the industry. Gameplay of Youtubers Life focuses mostly on creating and publishing videos related to video games, sports, lifestyle or cooking. The player starts their career with limited low-end equipment.

SG/ZH: School Girl/Zombie Hunter

Action 05 June 2018

A dynamic third-person perspective shooter developed by Tamsoft studio from Japan. The action of School Girl/Zombie Hunter takes place in the university known from the Onechanbara series. Once Musaku High School gets invaded by hordes of bloodthirsty zombies, five schoolgirls trapped inside rise up to the challenge and face them. Cooperation is the key to success – each heroine has unique abilities, weaknesses, and strengths, so only together they can battle the enemies.

Project CARS 3

Racing 28 August 2020

The third part of the popular series of racing games, which was developed by the Slightly Mad Studios team, as was the case with previous releases of the series.

Starfield: Shattered Space

RPG 30 September 2024

The first expansion for Bethesda's 2023 RPG. Starfield: Shattered Space allows us to learn more about House Va'Ruun and we are tasked with stopping a new cosmic threat. We can explore Va'Ruun's home planet, with a bunch of new quests, weapons and equipment available.

Volt Recharge

Racing 2025

A spiritual successor of the popular Re-Volt racing game. In Volt Recharge we use remote-controlled cars and race on tracks including backyards, building interiors, supermarkets and sewers. We can modify and upgrade vehicles and choose from single and multiplayer modes.

Train Sim World 5

Simulation 17 September 2024

The fifth installment of the train simulation series from Dovetail Games. Train Sim World 5 features new routes in USA, Germany and England, as well as new locomotives. Aside from driving the train we can also play as a conductor and deal with the passengers.

9 Days

Action 08 March 2024

An action adventure TPP game with an open world and a sci-fi setting. 9 Days features the titular time limit for us to prepare to face the ultimate threat. We are free to choose where we want to go, who we want to fight, and how our hero will gain new skills and items.

Train Valley World

Strategy 09 August 2024

An economic sim with puzzle elements, tasking us with building and managing railway networks. Train Valley World has us setting down railways and sending out trains in both singleplayer and multiplayer.

Hollowbody

Action 12 September 2024

A postapocalyptic survival horror game about Mica, a young, unlicensed Shipper traversing an abandoned British city. Hollowbody has us heading out on a simple mission that goes catastrophically wrong.

Space for Sale

Simulation 30 July 2024

A sandbox cross between a simulation and a strategy game. Space for Sale has us playing as an intergalactic developer, traversing alien planets, building homes and selling them for a profit.

WWII Operations: Lions on The Desert Front

Action 2025

A first-person shooter with action set in 1940. WWII Operations: Lions on The Desert Front was created using the popular FPSC tool and tells the story of Italian soldiers during World War II.
